description: All values associated with a claim are stored in the Claim External Value record. The AMB_COND_CD table holds ambulance transport condition codes.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the claim value record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: LN_AMB_TRANS_CD
columns.description: Stores Line Ambulance Transport Condition Code
